rows.label: tev068501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev068501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Da Girhi about the Wrothian children.

rows.label: tev068501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev068501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Da Girhi if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev068501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Da Girhi about materials.

rows.label: tev068501_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Da Girhi about recent developments.

rows.label: tev068501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Da Girhi about Oblivia.

rows.label: tev068501_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Da Girhi about recent developments.

rows.label: tev068501_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Da Girhi about recent developments.

rows.label: tev068501_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Da Girhi about recent developments.

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0001
rows.name:
When we served the Ganglion, we were ever able to
keep the bellies of our children full.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0002
rows.name:
But since arriving on Mira, their bellies have roiled.
Now they worsen by the day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0003
rows.name:
I have come to suspect that there was some sort of
toxin in the rations we had been receiving from the
Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0004
rows.name:
They were trying to bind us to their servitude by
leaving us unable to survive without their medicines.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0009
rows.name:
We have no ammunition and little food,
and our Skells stand ravaged and frail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0010
rows.name:
But our mettle as Wrothians has not been marred,
and we continue to fight as comrades who have
survived countless battles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0011
rows.name:
So long as we have that, we have nothing to fear
from the Ganglion—no matter how many pursuers
they send our way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0016
rows.name:
You have provided us with a great bounty of supplies.
Allow me to repay your generosity with some fruitful
intelligence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0017
rows.name:
Light-speed jet fins are among the most precious of
materials, and even the Ganglion have sought them
with much fervor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0018
rows.name:
These items can be acquired on occasion by besting
the aetrygons that dwell at King's Falls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0019
rows.name:
I imagine that your human artificers could use them to
make most spectacular contraptions. Should you have
a free moment, you must strive to gather a few.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0021
rows.name:
It seems we will begin receiving shipments of
ammunition and provisions from the humans soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0022
rows.name:
When they arrive, my brothers and I can finally head
out to settle things with the beast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0023
rows.name:
The medicines you provided have already restored our
children's vigor. We are in your debt for this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0028
rows.name:
At Lake Basel to the north, there dwells a ceto that
appears only during meteor showers at nighttide.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0029
rows.name:
It is said that it circles above the lake, feasting upon
anything and everything that catches its eye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0030
rows.name:
Should you best it, you might be able to knock some
rare treasure out of its corpse![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0031
rows.name:
But make no mistake—this is a dangersome beast.
Too formidable even for the likes of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0032
rows.name: You, however, may well stand a chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0033
rows.name:
In the battle with the queen jacul, neither my
elder brother's blade nor my younger brother's
strike proved effective by themselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0034
rows.name:
What proved decisive was the knowledge of her weak
point that you afforded us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0035
rows.name:
It is a lesson Vi Sezha has been preaching for years.
From this day forward, I shall cease charging blindly
into the fray...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0036
rows.name:
Instead, I will strive to discern my foe's weakness and
engage it with more disciplined strikes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0041
rows.name:
A warrior named Ge Jewhe went brashly forward
to brave the perils of Cauldros alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0042
rows.name:
I never imagined that she could possibly return safely
from such folly. Yet return she did![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0043
rows.name:
Vi Sezha had been awaiting her return as patiently as
a loyal bride. I have never seen her so happy!
What a joyous relief this is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0048
rows.name: I still cannot believe that Ge Jewhe has fallen in battle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0049
rows.name:
As a fellow Wrothian warrior, I should celebrate
her honorable death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0050
rows.name: But when I see the sorrow in Vi Sezha's eyes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068501_MSG0051
rows.name:
Well, I know that I could never replace Jewhe,
but as a friend, I wish to support Sezha through this
trying time.[ST:wait ]
